solution_line_template: There are currently {students_per_table} * {num_tables} = <<{students_per_table}*{num_tables}={current_students}>>{current_students} students sitting in the classroom.
There were {girls_to_bathroom} * {canteen_multiplier} = <<{girls_to_bathroom}*{canteen_multiplier}={students_to_canteen}>>{students_to_canteen} students who went to the canteen.

Sally has therefore noticed {girls_to_bathroom} + {students_to_canteen} = <<{girls_to_bathroom}+{students_to_canteen}={sally_missing_students}>>{sally_missing_students} students missing from the class.

Elliott said that {num_new_groups} groups of students have joined the class, so there are another {num_new_groups} * {students_per_group} = <<{num_new_groups}*{students_per_group}={elliott_missing_students}>>{elliott_missing_students} students who are not in the classroom.

Lucas said that there are {germany_students} + {france_students} + {norway_students} = <<{germany_students}+{france_students}+{norway_students}={lucas_missing_students}>>{lucas_missing_students} foreign exchange students who are not in the classroom.
